title: Phase 7.3: Audit Existing Examples
description: Review all doc examples: no waymark duplicating docstrings, adjacent not inside, line comments only (except CSS)

title: Phase 3.6: Remove Migrate Command
description: Delete migrate.ts and related files, users can use wm lint --rule legacy-pattern instead

title: Phase 3.5: Add include_codetags Config Option
description: When enabled, wm find surfaces legacy codetags as quasi-waymarks with legacy:true flag
notes: Added scan.include_codetags config, legacy codetag scanning in CLI, and tests; added legacy flag to WaymarkRecord.

title: Phase 3.1: Rename Lint Rules to Named-Only Scheme
description: Replace WM001/WM010/etc with named rules: unknown-marker, duplicate-property, multiple-tldr, legacy-pattern
notes: Introduced named lint rule registry with unknown-marker rule, updated lint output and docs/help to named scheme, adjusted lint tests.

title: Phase 5.2: Document History Behavior
description: Update README.md, PRD.md, CLI help text for history tracking and --reason flag

title: Phase 7.1: Add Docstring Clarity to README
description: Add 'Waymarks Are Not Docstrings' section explaining complementary roles

title: Phase 3.2: Implement duplicate-property Lint Rule
description: Parse waymark content for properties, track keys per waymark, flag duplicates (last wins but warn)
notes: Added duplicate-property lint rule scanning raw waymark lines (including continuation properties) and added test coverage.

title: Phase 1.1: Clarify Block Comment Policy in Docs
description: Update README.md, docs/GRAMMAR.md, PRD.md, .waymark/rules/WAYMARKS.md to clarify line comments preferred, block comments CSS-only
notes: Updated README.md, docs/GRAMMAR.md, and .waymark/rules/WAYMARKS.md with line-comment preference + docstring guidance. PRD.md not present in repo to update; if reintroduced, mirror block-comment policy there.

title: Phase 8.1: Update README.md
description: Update block comment examples, add docstring section, update CLI usage, remove wm map/migrate refs, add include_codetags mention

title: Waymark v1.0 Release
description: Comprehensive v1.0 release plan aligning docs, CLI, and implementation. See .agents/plans/v1/PLAN.md for full details.

title: Phase 3.3: Implement multiple-tldr Lint Rule
description: Group records by file, count tldr markers, flag files with >1 tldr
notes: Implemented multiple-tldr lint rule (error) with test coverage.

title: Phase 8.4: Update CLI Help Text
description: Update wm lint help with new rule names, remove wm migrate, update wm format examples, add --reason to wm remove

title: Phase 7.2: Add Docstring Clarity to GRAMMAR.md
description: Add technical section emphasizing grammar distinction from docstrings

title: Phase 6.1: Remove Protected Branch Policy
description: Remove signals_on_protected, protected_branches from config types, defaults, doctor.ts, PRD.md, GRAMMAR.md

title: Phase 4.2: Add Default Skip Patterns
description: Extend default skip_paths with fixtures, __fixtures__, test-data, *.fixture.*, *.invalid.*

title: Phase 5.1: Wire Up Remove History
description: Update WaymarkIdManager.remove() to accept and pass history metadata, add --reason flag

title: Phase 1.2: Verify Continuation Waymarks
description: Run continuation tests, verify docs match behavior, check PRD.md and GRAMMAR.md examples

title: Phase 4.1: Add Directory/Glob Support to Format
description: Use expandInputPaths instead of single file read, iterate over expanded paths, pre-filter files containing :::

title: Phase 8.3: Update docs/GRAMMAR.md
description: Update comment leader table for CSS-only block comments, add docstring section, update lint rules docs

title: Phase 8.2: Update PRD.md
description: Clarify block comment policy, remove wm map, update lint rules section, remove protected branch policy, update config example

title: Phase 3.4: Implement legacy-pattern Lint Rule
description: Scan for codetags (TODO:, FIXME:, NOTE:, HACK:, XXX:) and suggest waymark equivalents
notes: Implemented legacy-pattern lint rule scanning TODO/FIXME/etc. codetags with test coverage.

title: Phase 2.1: Implement --jsonl in Unified Parser
description: Fix silent failure where --jsonl outputs text. Extend handleJsonFlag to recognize both --json and --jsonl
notes: Added outputFormat parsing for --json/--jsonl in unified parser, updated unified output handling and tests.

title: Phase 4.3: Implement waymark-ignore-file Marker
description: Skip formatting files where first comment is // waymark-ignore-file
